abstract: Judge Jed S. Rakoff says that he intends to allow the jury in the trial of Rajat Gupta to hear four wiretapped conversations involving Raj Rajaratnam and colleagues of the Galleon Group hedge fund.
snippet: Judge Jed S. Rakoff says that he intends to allow the jury in the trial of Rajat Gupta to hear four wiretapped conversations involving Raj Rajaratnam and colleagues of the Galleon Group hedge fund.
lead_paragraph: It is perhaps the government’s most powerful piece of evidence in its case against Rajat K. Gupta, the former Goldman Sachs director accused of leaking boardroom secrets.

headline.main: Judge May Permit Wiretaps as Evidence in Insider Case

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
